body.p: The Text view is automatically displayed in the views pane of the Eclipse window to display text output from XSLT transformations, FO processor info, warnings, and error messages. It contains a tab for each file with text results displayed in the view.

section.title: Text View Contextual Menu Actions
section.p: The following actions are available when the contextual menu is invoked in this view:

dlentry.dd: Removes all content from the view.
Copies the selected content to the clipboard.
Selects all content in the view.
Formats (pretty-prints) the content in this view.
Allows you to perform search and replace operations.
Saves the content in the view to a file in text format.
